mapper.select: SELECT t1.* FROM (SELECT t2.user_id as user_id, max(t2.version) as max_version FROM nj_user_car t2 WHERE t2.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND version >=0 GROUP BY t2.user_id) tmp INNER JOIN nj_user_car t1 ON t1.user_id= tmp.user_id AND t1.version=tmp.max_version AND t1.del_flag=0
SELECT max(car.version) FROM nj_user_car car WHERE car.user_id=#{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND version >= 0

SELECT t1.id AS id, t1.brand, t1.model, t1.buy_price AS buyPrice, t1.first_payment AS firstPayment, t1.buy_date AS buy_date, t1.shdq AS house_address, t1.car_number as carNumber, t1.first_project_no as firstProjectNo, t1.last_project_no as lastProjectNo FROM (SELECT t2.user_id as user_id, max(t2.version) as max_version FROM nj_user_car t2 WHERE t2.user_id=#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND t2.version >= 0 GROUP BY t2.user_id) tmp INNER JOIN nj_user_car t1 ON t1.user_id= tmp.user_id AND t1.version=tmp.max_version AND t1.del_flag=0

SELECT t1.attachment_id AS attachmentId ,t1.type ,t2.file_path AS attachmentUrl FROM nj_user_car_attachment t1 INNER JOIN nj_user_attachment t2 ON t1.attachment_id = t2.id WHERE t1.user_car_id = #{carId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY t1.type ASC

SELECT ur.`id` id, ur.`car_number` carNumber, ur.`car_type` carType, ur.`buy_price` buyPrice, ur.`car_age` carAge, ur.`shdq` shdq, ur.`xjcd` xjcd, ua.`file_path` filepath FROM nj_order_user_car our LEFT JOIN nj_user_car ur ON our.user_car_id = ur.id LEFT JOIN nj_user_car_attachment uca ON ur.`id`=uca.`user_car_id` LEFT JOIN nj_user_attachment ua ON uca.`attachment_id`=ua.`id` WHERE our.order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
